code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./counter.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Counter(){var seats=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter.seats;});var moviename=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter.name;});var numberofticket=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter.numberofticket;});var amount=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter.amt;});var navigation=useNavigate();var counter=function counter(){alert("your ticket is booked");navigation("/");window.location.reload(false);};var Back=function Back(){navigation("/Booking");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Book your ticket and enjoy the movie"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Movie Name "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:moviename}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Seat Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:seats+""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:" Total Seat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:numberofticket}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:amount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return counter();},children:" book now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:Back,children:"Back"})]})]})});}export default Counter;
